name: Confuza Ball Re-Rolled
description:
Be The Ball!

Jump into a world of puzzles where gravity doesn't play by the rules - to collect hidden gems and reach the exit, your ball will need to roll up the sides of walls, jump over gaps and avoid tricky traps and other obstacles!

This is no ordinary ball – rolling off an edge will change the direction of gravity, allowing you to stick to any surface – but be careful not to roll away, as your ball cannot stick to surfaces while bouncing.

Re-Rolled for PC

Confuza Ball Re-Rolled is an upgraded port of our Android puzzler, "Confuza Ball" - with improved graphics, re-worked levels, more spectacular lighting and particle effects, and many gameplay improvements to enjoy.

Note: The Windows version of this game does not contain any in-app purchases or real-money transactions. In-game coins are earned by playing the game only.

Features
  • Solve brain-bending gravity puzzles
  • Classic Android game re-mastered for PC
  • Added bloom & real-time shadows
  • Re-worked many levels
  • Dazzling light & particle-effects
  • Chillaxing soundtrack
  • No Ads, No IAP, No nonsense!
Controls

Move the ball with the W,A,S,D keys (A and D turns 90 degrees, W and S moves forward and backward). Press the Spacebar to jump.

Hold the Right Mouse-Button (RMB) to look around.

Minimum Specs
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • CPU: Intel® Pentium® 2Ghz
  • GPU: Intel® HD Graphics 610 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4GB RAM
